overview: Steve Lesem brings vision and an extensive set of capabilities to this leadership position, including significant experience in the IT service provider and telecommunications industry. Steve has managed operations throughout the world, and has led complex sales, marketing, business development and product management activities across software and hardware solutions. Prior to Mezeo, Steve was Senior Vice President and Chief Marketing Officer of VeriCenter, a successful managed IT hosting provider, acquired by SunGard in 2007. Steve has served in multiple senior executive roles, including Senior Vice President of Worldwide Sales for SafeNet, a Maryland based security technology firm. At BMC Software, a Houston based systems management software solution provider, Steve served in a variety of capacities, including VP of Business Development and Channel Programs, Asia Pacific. Prior to BMC, Steve held multiple sales and marketing positions at IBM including General Manager, PC Server Sales and Marketing for North America. Steve holds a Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering from the University of Texas at Austin.
